name: Yakudate! Seishun
nutshell:
Yakudate Seishun
Komori Atsuhiro loves his job cleaning, especially for the sexy writer Haidamaki Munesan.


Sakura Iro
Mayama has always admired his boss Taki Buchou, but now he's having sexy dreams about him?


Shisen no Toriko
Because of a unique psychological condition due to a childhood trauma, Chigara decides to become a nude male model. But will the teacher of the class Ozu Makoto get a reaction out of him?


Anata no Te no Ue
Enami Hiro just got a job and as collection agent and he's terrible at it! The guy he's supposed to collect from is giving him the run around. Can soft-hearted Hiro make the guy pay up?


Mujaki ni Wagamama
When doctor Yamagami Seiichi causes the accident that breaks snowboarder Nozuru Motomu's leg, he devotes himself to his care. But Nozuru acts like a spoiled brat, albeit a very cute one…

name: Kinkyori Ren'ai
nutshell: Uni is a prodigy with a cool reserve who is accomplished in everything except for English. One day, she insults her temporary English teacher and he overhears her. He asks her to come to his office after school and, somehow, she starts receiving private tutoring from him?!

name: Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Big Bang Mission!!!
nutshell: Spin-off manga and the sequel to both Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Dark Demon Realm Mission! and Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Universe Mission.

name: Kamisama Shop de Cheat no Kaori
Model-chan to Jimi Mane-san
nutshell: A cool model and a manager’s romantic comedy begins!

name: My Roommate Found Out That I Drew Her in a Yuri Manhua!
nutshell: Amateur manhua artist Xiu Yang (♀) drew her roommate Wu Xi (♀) into her own yuri manhua. While she says it's for reference purposes, in reality...

name: Shitsuji Kuroboshi wa Kashizukanai
nutshell:
We follow the daily life of a slightly capricious butler who doesn't really listen to what others tell him. It is then that he meets a high school student named Murasaki who falls in love with him.
This is the beginning of a love story between not a really obedient butler and a girl in need of love.

name: GR Number 5
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Akira, mortally wounded, is reborn as a cyborg by Dr. Sarumaru, a scientist who has transplanted his brain into a gorilla's body. Together with Lori, a beautiful girl who has escaped from another world, the eccentric Dr. Sarumaru, robots, androids, and others, he forms a team of repairers (Group Repair = G-R) to solve the troubles caused by the invasion of another dimension.... The start of a SF adventure that could be called "another Cyborg 009," which was drawn at the same time as 009!

name: Sleeping (Male) Beauty
nutshell: Tomoi Hisatsugu went to New York to work as a doctor. But that's not all. He hopes to lead an easier life as a young homosexual than in Japan. Indeed, he meets another doctor, Richard Stein, and they become lovers. Nemureru Mori no Binan tells of their relationship in an extremely realistic way. It is a very down to earth story with characters that could meet in the street every day and doesn't use the elements so common in today's shounen-ai manga.

name: Tabetemo Oishiku Arimasen
nutshell: A world where demons prevail and humans are rare. Hiyori, a human, is considered to be delicious to demons. However, his classmate, Hodaka, a pushy big-horned demon, found out his secret. On top of that, he kissed and tasted him…Charming a demon—a troublesome situation?! Surrendering to one's instinct and pleasure leads to…

name: Love Live! Sunshine!! - Namioto yori Hokorobi (Doujinshi)
Kuyashii Kedo Kimi ga Suki
nutshell: The two that want to be closer. A love story of a sweet adult romance… starts.

name: Unmei wa Maigo
nutshell:
"Sometimes you hurt the ones you love without ever realizing it."
Taizou and Ikuto, only one year apart, have been together since childhood. They went to the same kindergarten, the same middle school, and even the same high school. Despite being younger, it's thanks to Ikuto that Taizou managed to pass his college entrance exam, so that they could go to the same school together. However, in the year that they're apart, Ikuto drifts away and ends up going to a different school. Taizou, oblivious to Ikuto's feelings, chases after him to find out what happened.

name: Reincarnated to Be the Wicked Maid at the Main Lead's Side
nutshell: The once well-known online game "Magic Continent of Light" is now ready to be discontinued for a dying year. Hardcore fan otaku Wei Chuan decided to accompany the game to the last second, but he did not expect that the villain in the original game would drag him into the game!

name: Shoki no Nizen
nutshell: A story of Otogibara Era and Inui Toko, the two virtual youtubers of Nijisanji.

name: Suki nara Sukitte Ie yo!
nutshell:
Suki nara Sukitte Ie yo!
New male teacher Himeno at an all-girls school is confronted by class chairman Asuka, will hearts collide as well as tempers?


Uso Toki Doki Honto
Himeno and Asuka are in somewhat bliss, but what will happen when their relationship my leak out and doubts creep in.


Love ver. 5
When ruff-and-tumble Hokuto is looked upon kindly by a Miharu, what will he think when he goes to her house and finds her four beautiful male roommates?


Hard Bread Morning
When Yuki meets Tooru she's taken on a whirlwind 'date' and ends up working at the bread place with him. What's under his mean demeanor and passion for making bread?

name: Daisy
nutshell:
"When I was a girl, I shut these sweet feelings away in the depths of my heart… But now they're emerging once more."
Haruna bumps into her old senpai Akihi again years after their time together in high school, who runs just as hot-and-cold as she always did. Buried emotions start to stir.

name: Super Mario Sunshine 4Koma Manga Kingdom
nutshell: An official 4koma manga by various artists about the videogame, "Super Mario Sunshine", published in 2002.

name: Starlight Manaburn
nutshell:
This is a manga about Magic: The Gathering and the spiritual sequel to Starlight Wizards. But unlike its prequel, it doesn't require any knowledge of Magic: The Gathering. So if you ever wanted to learn MTG or wanted to read a manga about MTG, this manga is perfect for you.
It was serialized in the official Japanese MTG magazine in 2005 and is considered a classic in the Japanese MTG scene.

name: 18 Going on 25
nutshell: An 18-year-old teenager woke up one day to find herself seven years older and married. One minute she was just starting college, the next minute she became a go-getter CEO and someone’s wife! To add to her surprise, her husband happened to be Jiang Jingyan, the “underachiever” at school, with whom she never saw eye to eye.

name: Tokedase! Mizore-chan
nutshell:
Follow the antics of a snowman turned Yuki-Onna hellbent on destroying the sun with the help of a child named Himari and her Aunt Koharu.
Links:
 Author's Twitter

name: Intense
nutshell: O senhor do crime Yoonshik leva um menino chamado Jiwoon como garantia quando o pai da criança se mata por causa de uma divida. Oito anos depois, o menino está trabalhando como guarda-costas de Yoonshik. Quando o patrão vai parar atrás das grades, Jiwoon é enviado para trabalhar para outro chefe no distrito da luz vermelha. Lá, Jiwoon encontra um mudo misterioso, Soohan, e tudo pode mudar para ele.

name: Otokonoko no Koto wa Nani mo Shiranai
nutshell:
1-2. Otokonoko no Koto wa Nani mo Shiranai (I have no idea about boys)
3-4. Shinshi wa Kedamono ga Osuki (The Gentleman and the Beast)
5. Ai Kamoshirenee daro! (Could this be Love)
6. Furachi na Yoru ni (A Regrettable Night)

name: A Fabricated Love Affair
nutshell: "Hey, over there, your girlfriend is passing by" "What? Do you want to die?" Lee Se-kyung is not good at anything besides studying. I am always bullied in that way by the kids at my school. When she goes out of school, she's a cheap girl herself?! Everyone doesn't recognize her because she's the complete opposite of school, and even adult men don't know that she's a high school student and begs Se-kyung to meet her. Tried to fool people and have some fun. What is that? Even if he is caught, his identity is found out by his classmate Ha Seon-woo?! The wandering, love, and youth of teenagers who are neither adults nor children. A sweet and spicy adolescent romance begins!

name: Harenchi
nutshell:
"Does the attractive force make me attracted to you ?"
Sonoko is leading a life of high school girl idly, and one day at after school she "accidentally" kissed her friend's boyfriend in the science room. But Ito, a super A-student, saw the scene!! Although Sonoko hurriedly fled?
Compilation of three oneshot stories: Harenchi, Denpa and Kuri Muso Da.

name: Parabellum
nutshell: On the very first day that Kuze Aoi transferred to Hinomiya Academy, he finds himself facing down the barrel of a gun. He is introduced to the campus and the student body by his childhood friend Miyabi and learns about the prince and princess among students, Shitara Sagiri and Hinomiya Kuon. Sagiri is a cool and beautiful while Kuon is elegant and magnificent. After school, Aoi gets lost on campus and Kuon begins shooting at him and he's barely saved by a random girl named Atarashi Sonoko. It seems that Aoi holds a secret that is critical in a feud between two old, powerful families.

name: Mysteries, Maidens, and Mysterious Disappearances
nutshell: Mysterious incidents in a city, one after the other. A demonic being is challenged to resolve them. Sumireko, seemingly a plain store clerk, aspires to be a novelist and rocks an alluring body with some ardent admirers. Adashino, an admirer who looks like a boy, is a bookstore clerk. He's steeped in mystery however, at first, until the path of challenges is revealed that he and his sister must face in the city in order to win their ticket back home, outside this world. A story of modern mysteries and romantic aspirations begins.
